segments.text: Mr . Smith , while you're out , the sales department called and asked you to lunch next Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll put them in my schedule . Are there any other messages ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , Miss Chen informed that the monthly management meeting has been changed to July 11 and I've marked your diary accordingly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is the agenda for the meeting and that's all for the messages .
segments.speaker: S1
